channels.name: server-announcements
channels.description: Important updates, events, and changes related to the server

channels.name: introductions
channels.description: Introduce yourself to the construction community! Share your background and interests

channels.name: general-discussion
channels.description: Open discussions about anything related to construction

channels.description: Latest news, trends, and happenings in the construction industry

channels.name: project-planning
channels.description: Discussions about project planning, scheduling, and budgeting

channels.name: contract-management
channels.description: Share and discuss information about contract types, procurement, and risk management

channels.name: quality-control
channels.description: Discussions about quality control, inspections, and testing procedures

channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for project closeout, commissioning, and handover

channels.name: architectural-design
channels.description: Discussions about architectural design principles, concepts, and software

channels.name: structural-engineering
channels.description: Share and discuss information about structural design, analysis, and building codes

channels.name: mep-systems
channels.description: Discussions about mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems design and integration

channels.name: bim-and-cad
channels.description: Share and discuss information about Building Information Modeling (BIM) and Computer-Aided Design (CAD) tools and workflows

channels.name: sustainable-design
channels.description: Discussions about sustainable design strategies, green building certifications, and energy efficiency

channels.name: concrete-and-masonry
channels.description: Share and discuss information about concrete mix design, formwork, reinforcement, and masonry techniques

channels.name: carpentry-and-framing
channels.description: Discussions about wood framing, finish carpentry, and prefabrication methods

channels.name: electrical-and-lighting
channels.description: Share and discuss information about electrical systems, wiring, and lighting design and installation

channels.name: plumbing-and-hvac
channels.description: Discussions about plumbing systems, HVAC equipment, and indoor air quality

channels.name: roofing-and-waterproofing
channels.description: Share and discuss information about roofing materials, waterproofing membranes, and flashing details

channels.name: construction-technology
channels.description: Discussions about emerging technologies, such as 3D printing, robotics, and IoT applications in construction

channels.name: degree-programs
channels.description: Discussions about construction management, engineering, and architecture degree programs

channels.name: certifications-and-licenses
channels.description: Share and discuss information about professional certifications, licenses, and continuing education opportunities

channels.name: internships-and-apprenticeships
channels.description: Post and discuss internship and apprenticeship opportunities in the construction industry

channels.name: career-advice
channels.description: Share and discuss career advice, job search strategies, and professional development tips

channels.name: general-chat
channels.description: Casual conversations and off-topic discussions for the construction community

channels.name: events-and-conferences
channels.description: Share and discuss information about construction industry events, trade shows, and conferences

channels.name: project-showcase
channels.description: Showcase and discuss interesting construction projects, case studies, and success stories

channels.name: server-feedback
channels.description: Provide feedback and suggestions for improving the Construction Hub server

channels.name: server-rules
channels.description: Review and understand the server rules, guidelines, and code of conduct

channels.name: role-assignments
channels.description: Assign roles to users based on their interests, expertise, or specialization
